languages.text: "Мы с тобой оба в ловушке, Вольный Торговец. Но, в отличие от тебя, я хотя бы понимаю ее масштабы". {n}Ваш выстрел проходит сквозь экран, не нанеся ему повреждений. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мы с тобой оба в ловушке, Вольный Торговец. Но, в отличие от тебя, я хотя бы понимаю ее масштабы". {n}Ваш выстрел проходит сквозь экран, не нанеся ему повреждений. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

languages.text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

languages.text: 「ここからは二人とも出られない、ローグ・トレーダー。だが、お前と違って、少なくとも事態の規模くらいはわかっている。」 {n}撃った一発はスクリーンを通り抜け、傷一つ付かない。サルゴナは脇のジェネレーターの一つにちらりと目をやり、まだ無事か確かめるように見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ここからは二人とも出られない、ローグ・トレーダー。だが、お前と違って、少なくとも事態の規模くらいはわかっている。」 {n}撃った一発はスクリーンを通り抜け、傷一つ付かない。サルゴナは脇のジェネレーターの一つにちらりと目をやり、まだ無事か確かめるように見る。{/n}

languages.text: «Estamos los dos atrapados, Comerciante Independiente. Pero yo al menos soy consciente de la magnitud de esta situación». {n}Tu disparo atraviesa limpiamente la pantalla sin causar ningún daño. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay al lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estamos los dos atrapados, Comerciante Independiente. Pero yo al menos soy consciente de la magnitud de esta situación». {n}Tu disparo atraviesa limpiamente la pantalla sin causar ningún daño. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay al lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}

languages.text: “我们两个都被困在这里了，行商浪人。但我和你不一样，我很清楚眼下的形势。”{n}你的子弹毫无阻碍地穿过了屏障，没能造成任何伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们两个都被困在这里了，行商浪人。但我和你不一样，我很清楚眼下的形势。”{n}你的子弹毫无阻碍地穿过了屏障，没能造成任何伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir sitzen hier beide in der Falle, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber im Gegensatz zu Euch erkenne ich wenigstens den Ernst der Lage." {n}Dein Schuss geht direkt durch den Bildschirm, ohne Schaden zu verursachen. Sargona wirft einen raschen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er prüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir sitzen hier beide in der Falle, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber im Gegensatz zu Euch erkenne ich wenigstens den Ernst der Lage." {n}Dein Schuss geht direkt durch den Bildschirm, ohne Schaden zu verursachen. Sargona wirft einen raschen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er prüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous sommes tous les deux pris au piège ici, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais moi, au moins, j'ai la mesure de la situation. » {n}Votre tir traverse l'écran sans la moindre trace de dégâts. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes tous les deux pris au piège ici, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais moi, au moins, j'ai la mesure de la situation. » {n}Votre tir traverse l'écran sans la moindre trace de dégâts. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}

languages.text: "İkimiz de burada kapana kısılı vaziyetteyiz Hür Tacir. Senden farklı olarak ben, en azından durumun vahametinin farkındayım." {n}Atışın, herhangi bir hasar meydana getirmeden ekranın içinden geçip gidiyor. Sargona, sanki hâlâ sağlam olup olmadığını kontrol ediyormuş gibi yan taraftaki jeneratörlerden birine hızla göz atıyor.{/n}

But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}
